room_title: Escape room "Inheritance" by Escape Bradenton in Sarasota
review: Had a great time in the inheritance room. Played with 3 people. Challenging enough to be fun but not so challenging that it is frustrating and not to easy to be boring. Wasn't successful in escaping the room in the allotted time but got very close. Had a blast!

room_title: Escape room "Inheritance" by Escape Bradenton in Sarasota
review: It was great! From the moment we walked in, the staff was fun and informative. There were eight of us and we found it very challenging. We did the Inheritance room. Definitely a must do!

room_title: Escape room "Inheritance" by Escape Bradenton in Sarasota
review: Did the Inheritance room tonight with local friends and family visiting from France! The game was a perfect way to push through language barriers and get everyone engaged! Tons of fun and great staff! Thanks Escape Bradenton!

room_title: Escape room "Inheritance" by Escape Bradenton in Sarasota
review: We had a fantastic time as a group of 6 adults and one 11-year-old in the Inheritance room. The scene was set, the props and puzzles were intriguing. We were completely absorbed in the game. This is a great team-building and family-building activity that helps you see the strengths in others. The owner custom creates the rooms, and this makes the experience really authentic. Go do it!

room_title: Escape room "Inheritance" by Escape Bradenton in Sarasota
review: Love escape rooms. Done every one in the SRQ area and Escape Bradenton is great. Just did Inheritance, and already booked out for the other rooms.
